含义: 访 means to visit, to call on, or to inquire. It often implies a purposeful visit, such as visiting someone to seek information or to pay respects.
字形: 访 is a left-right structured character. The left part is '言' (yán), which means speech or language, and the right part is '方' (fāng), which means direction or method. Together, they suggest the idea of seeking information or direction through speech.
读音: 访 is pronounced as 'fǎng' in Mandarin.
字源: The character 访 originates from ancient Chinese, combining '言' (speech) and '方' (direction/method). It reflects the idea of seeking information or guidance through communication.
含此字的字: Some characters that contain '访' include 访问 (fǎngwèn, to visit/interview), 访谈 (fǎngtán, interview), and 访客 (fǎngkè, visitor).
同音字: 同音字 (homophones) for '访' include 仿 (fǎng, to imitate), 纺 (fǎng, to spin), and 舫 (fǎng, a boat).
常用词组: 拜访 (bàifǎng, to pay a visit)
成语: 访贫问苦 (fǎng pín wèn kǔ, to visit the poor and inquire about their hardships)
访亲问友 (fǎng qīn wèn yǒu, to visit relatives and friends)
例句: 他经常去拜访他的老师。 (Tā jīngcháng qù bàifǎng tā de lǎoshī. He often visits his teacher.)
记者正在访问一位名人。 (Jìzhě zhèngzài fǎngwèn yī wèi míngrén. The reporter is interviewing a celebrity.)
短故事: 从前，有一位学者为了寻找智慧，四处访师问道。他走遍山川，拜访了许多智者，最终领悟了人生的真谛。 (Once upon a time, a scholar traveled far and wide to seek wisdom. He visited many sages and eventually understood the true meaning of life.)
一位年轻人为了寻找失散多年的亲人，踏上了漫长的访亲之路。经过多年的努力，他终于与家人团聚。 (A young man embarked on a long journey to find his long-lost relatives. After years of effort, he finally reunited with his family.)
诗词: 《访戴天山道士不遇》 - 李白 (Lǐ Bái, 'Visiting the Taoist Priest on Mount Dai and Not Finding Him')
《访隐者不遇》 - 贾岛 (Jiǎ Dǎo, 'Visiting the Recluse and Not Finding Him')
